content: a classic autumn must-have for your home and a great way to use up mini skeins the gourdgeous minis are very beginner friendly and super easy to assemble these cute mini gourds are crocheted in the round with magic loop method and half-double crochets make a whole pumpkin patch worth and scatter them around your home for a little fall decor materials 1 mini skein or 80yds/73meters of fingering weight category 1 yarn size us b/1-2 25mm crochet hook removable stitch markers optional scissors stuffing/poly-fil tapestry needle finished size approx diameter 3 /7 6cm gauge 7 sts x 5 row = 1 in half_double_crochet crocheted flat
